properties.name: spring.xcloud.component.integration.feign.enable
properties.description: If false, Even if annotated by @EnableSpringBootFeignClients, it will not be automatically configured, which is especially suitable for local mode starter module, But Notes: if the startup class is annotated by @EnableFeignClients, you cannot turn off auto configuration.(Tip: using @EnableSpringBootFeignClients is equivalent to @EnableFeignClients)

properties.name: spring.xcloud.component.integration.feign.defaultUrl
properties.description: Default feign client remote call base url. (Note: only applicable to springboot + feign environment, not applicable to springcloud + feign environment)

properties.name: spring.xcloud.component.integration.feign.defaultLogLevel
properties.description: Default feign client remote call logLevel. (Note: only applicable to springboot + feign environment, not applicable to springcloud + feign environment)

properties.name: spring.xcloud.component.integration.feign.maxIdleConnections
properties.description: Default feign client maxIdleConnections. (Note: only applicable to springboot + feign environment, not applicable to springcloud + feign environment)

properties.name: spring.xcloud.component.integration.feign.keepAliveDuration
properties.description: Default feign client keepAliveDuration ms. (Note: only applicable to springboot + feign environment, not applicable to springcloud + feign environment)

properties.name: spring.xcloud.component.integration.feign.connectTimeout
properties.description: Default feign client connectTimeout. (Note: only applicable to springboot + feign environment, not applicable to springcloud + feign environment)

properties.name: spring.xcloud.component.integration.feign.readTimeout
properties.description: Default feign client readTimeout. (Note: only applicable to springboot + feign environment, not applicable to springcloud + feign environment)

properties.name: spring.xcloud.component.integration.feign.writeTimeout
properties.description: Default feign client writeTimeout. (Note: only applicable to springboot + feign environment, not applicable to springcloud + feign environment)

properties.name: spring.xcloud.component.integration.feign.followRedirects
properties.description: Default feign client followRedirects. (Note: only applicable to springboot + feign environment, not applicable to springcloud + feign environment)
